title: Roast beef with broad beans and mushrooms
ingredients: ['1 beef topside joint, about 750 g (1 lb 10 oz)', '250 g (9 oz) shelled broad beans, defrosted if frozen', '250 g (9 oz) mixed mushrooms, such as chanterelles (girolles), oysters and shiitake', '2 tablespoons Madeira, sherry or red wine', '150-200 ml (5-7 fl oz) meat stock', 'Salt and black pepper']
